channel.title: Just need a quick piece fo code
channel.description: I know it should be easy but i dont know how to add things like clicks per second...i just want it to be like if clicks > 1.2 per then sendmessage rofl noob your massing and make the plaer say it out loud so i can ban em if i see it or just make it like they get 20 then they get iped :X
